SELECT a.id AS artist_id, a.name AS artist_name, tg.name AS mood_name, SUM(vote_count) AS vote_count FROM ( -- 트랙 투표 SELECT t.artist_id, tg.id AS tag_id, COUNT(*) AS vote_count FROM track_mood_vote tmv JOIN track t ON tmv.track_id = t.id JOIN tag tg ON tmv.mood = tg.id GROUP BY t.artist_id, tg.id
-- 앨범 투표 부분 삭제 (album_mood_vote 테이블 없음) -- UNION ALL -- SELECT al.artist_id, tg.id AS tag_id, COUNT(*) AS vote_count -- FROM album_mood_vote amv -- JOIN album al ON amv.album_id = al.id -- JOIN tag tg ON amv.mood = tg.id -- GROUP BY al.artist_id, tg.id ) AS votes JOIN artist a ON votes.artist_id = a.id JOIN tag tg ON votes.tag_id = tg.id GROUP BY a.id, a.name, tg.name, tg.id ORDER BY a.name, vote_count DESC
